an9.62:1.1: “Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an9.62:1.3: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ—
an9.62:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an9.62:2.1: Nava, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an9.62:2.3: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ—
an9.62:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
